name: biomni-analyze-endolysosomal-calcium-dynamics
title: Biomni: Analyze Endolysosomal Calcium Dynamics
description: Analyze calcium dynamics in endo-lysosomal compartments using ELGA/ELGA1 probe data.
content:
Overview

Analyze calcium dynamics in endo-lysosomal compartments using ELGA/ELGA1 (Endo-Lysosomal Genetically encoded calcium Activator) probe data. This tool processes luminescence-based calcium measurements to quantify Ca2+ release and uptake kinetics in endosomes and lysosomes, which are critical for vesicular trafficking, autophagy, and lysosomal function.

Input Parameters

  • time_points (required): Array of time points for calcium measurements (seconds)
  • luminescence_values (required): Array of luminescence intensity values corresponding to calcium levels
  • treatment_time (optional): Time point when treatment/stimulation was applied (seconds)
  • cell_type (optional, default=''): Type of cells being analyzed
  • treatment_name (optional, default=''): Name of treatment applied
  • output_file (optional, default='calcium_analysis_results.txt'): Output file name

Biological Use Case

This analysis is essential for:

  • Studying lysosomal calcium signaling in health and disease
  • Investigating autophagy regulation and lysosomal dysfunction
  • Characterizing lysosomal storage disorders (LSDs)
  • Evaluating drug effects on endolysosomal calcium homeostasis
  • Understanding vesicular trafficking and membrane fusion events
  • Assessing cellular responses to lysosomal stressors

Output

Returns comprehensive calcium dynamics analysis including:

  • Peak calcium response amplitude
  • Time to peak calcium release
  • Rate of calcium uptake/clearance
  • Baseline and stimulated calcium levels
  • Area under the curve (AUC) for calcium response
  • Statistical summary and quality metrics

Category

physiology
